subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees roughed up Johan Santana in his first start since throwing a no-hitter, knocking him out after five innings. He gave up seven hits, four of them homers, and six runs.
snippet: The Yankees roughed up Johan Santana in his first start since throwing a no-hitter, knocking him out after five innings. He gave up seven hits, four of them homers, and six runs.
